```python
def get_recent_files(days: int = 7) -> str:
```

### ğŸ® ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹

#### åœºæ™¯ï¼šè®© AI Agent è‡ªåŠ¨è¯»å–å½“å‰ç›®å½•ä¸‹æœ€æ–°çš„ Jupyter Notebookï¼Œå¹¶æå–ä»£ç å•å…ƒ

```json
// å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¯·æ±‚ï¼ˆç”± LLM ç”Ÿæˆï¼‰
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "jupyter.list_notebooks",
```

```python
# servers/jupyter/server.pyï¼ˆç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆï¼‰
import sys
import json
from pathlib import Path

def list_notebooks(path: str, sort_by="modified", limit=5):
    notebooks = sorted(
        Path(path).glob("*.ipynb"),
        key=lambda f: f.stat().st_mtime,
        reverse=True
    )[:limit]
    
    return {
        "notebooks": [
            {"name": n.name, "path": str(n), "modified": n.stat().st_mtime}
            for n in notebooks
        ]
    }

def main():
    while True:
        line = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
        if not line:
            break
            
        req = json.loads(line)
        method = req["method"]
        params = req.get("params", {})
        
        if method == "jupyter.list_notebooks":
            result = list_notebooks(**params)
            resp = {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "result": result, "id": req["id"]}
        else:
            resp = {
                "jsonrpc": "2.0",
                "error": {"code": -32601, "message": f"Method {method} not found"},
                "id": req.get("id")
            }
        
        print(json.dumps(resp), flush=True)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

#### é¢„æœŸè¾“å‡ºï¼š

```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
```
